prng.utility

Class DigestDataOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • prng.utility.DigestDataOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataOutput

    public class DigestDataOutput
extends Object
implements DataOutput
    An output stream that only calculates a digest. To ensure the digest is robust, the input to this class should be such that if the bytes were stored and later read back, the original data could be reconstructed.
    Author:
    Simon Greatrix

      • writeUTF

        public void writeUTF(String str)
        As defined in DataOutput, writes the supplied String out as modified UTF-8. Unlike DataOutput, there is no length prefix. Instead a zero byte is appended. This allows Strings of any length to be handled.
        Specified by:
        writeUTF in interface DataOutput
        Parameters:
        str - the String to output
